title: Adele shows off new figure at Drake’s party: 'I used to cry but now I sweat'
text:
Adele shows off new figure at Drake’s party: 'I used to cry but now I sweat'

Cape Town - Adele looked absolutely breathtaking at Drake’s thirty-third birthday party.

When attending the rapper’s bash at Goya Studios in Hollywood, The Water Under Bridge songstress showed off her stunning new figure, Daily Mail reports.

Adele posted a picture on Instagram to showcase her glamorous off the shoulder black velvet dress.

"I used to cry but now I sweat," the 31-year-old captioned her post.

"Happy birthday to one of the kindest and funniest people I’ve met @champagnepapi [Drake]."

SEE THE POST HERE:

Since posting the picture, the singer’s fans have gushed about her transformation, Mirror reports.

"She slayed me," one person commented.

"You’re looking prettier than ever," another person said.

The 15-time Grammy winner reportedly lost more than 6kg while working out with friend Ayda Field.

Sources: Instagram, Daily Mail, Mirror
description: When attending the rapper’s bash at Goya Studios in Hollywood, the Water under the Bridge songstress showed off her stunning new figure.
